author: parithosh
content:
We're testing out `minimal` build support (and would want to actively use it in testing for the future forks). Seems like most clients need a recompiled image for this to work, we'd probably add support on the `ethpandaops/` docker images for this. 

It does seem like some clients don't yet support the `ELECTRA_FORK_EPOCH` field in `config.yaml` (and throw errors if its specified). There's a PR to add the field to the canonical config: https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/3632

It'd be great if clients can add support for the field, as our entire testing stack would move to including the field (Albeit set to activate at infinity by default).
